question: I need to know the meaning of my Istikhara dream.
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu 'alaykum. A friend told me about a girl in pakistan. i performed Istikhara once and did not get any message and i performed Istikhara again last night. and after fajr i saw a dream, here are the details of the dream. "In the dream a woman returns to her house and I see her daughter very happy, the husband is sleeping in a bed and upon his wife's arrival he smiles while still in bed." thats all i could remember from the dream. does this dream have anything to do with my istikhara. if yes then whats the message im getting. JazakAllah khairan wassalamu 'alaykum
ANSWER


Share:
There is a positive indication in the dream. We advise you continue with the
Istikhaara until your heart is inclined in any one direction.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
